text: David Lutz Norquist (born November 24, 1966) is an American financial management professional and government official. He has served as the United States deputy secretary of defense from 2019 to 2021. He served for two days as the acting United States secretary of defense in January 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== * |- |- Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: David Norquist
